title: Without having an Apple TV, am I able to stream from my iPhone to my TV? How? - Quora

response.answer_text: Every iPhone from the iPhone 5 has the ability to connect a HDMI to lightning adapter to it. I do this on a regular basis since around 2012 first with my iPad mini (original) and with my iPhone 5s when I want to watch something. This will put a mirror of your iPhone on the screen. The only other way would be to use airplay and that would be to have an Apple TV hooked to you TV.

I think this is only possible if you have a TV that supports Apple AirPlay 2. This CNET article seems to have a bit more information about which manufacture support airplay 2. Apple AirPlay 2: Everything you need to know
